page.title: 05FARMING
page.content: The facts that we have discovered are that farms need to be large by local standards-100-200acres,probably run in conjunction with a brother or some relative,so not much labour is employed:the owner and the family not being included in this category.However much machinery is used or shared between family farms,so a variety of skills is necessary for anyone working in agriculture:-skills with machines,feed,crops and stock. Generally farms were mixed emphasis being on dairy,beef and sheep;all products sold through the usual monopolies:-Milk Marketing Board, local market or abbattoir and Wool Marketing Board.
